description: Syntax Error: When attempting to use a Generator to create a dictionary of keys, an unexpected syntax error is thrown, stating that the generator is not valid for the type of object.
code:
# Create a Generator to generate keys
def generate_keys():
    key_list = []
    for i in range(10):
        key_list.append(i)
    yield key_list

# Create a Dictionary with the Generator
dict_keys
